participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Sensitive and nostalgic, Emily cherishes her memories and values her relationships.
participant_1.background: I lost my dog, and it still hurts to think about him. I believe in fairytales. I have a master's degree. I want to wear my favorite dress and boots while watching Friends. I spend time with my family and try to remember all the good times we've had.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Supportive and humorous, Jake enjoys making others smile and values health and fitness.
participant_2.background: I like to go to YouTube to watch funny videos with my nephews. My most prized possession is my running shoes because they have helped me to stay healthy and active throughout the years. I don't have any social media presence because my time is focused on my music. I listen to Bruno Mars' music and reminisce about the good times I had playing sports with my family and friends when I was younger. I hate to lose.

content.text: Hi. I'm a bit sad. I lost my dog recently.
Hi. I'm sorry to hear that. I love dogs too. They're the best.
I know. He was the best friend I ever had.
What kind of dog was he?
He was a golden retriever. The sweetest dog ever.
I love golden retrievers. They're so friendly and loving.
He was the best. I still miss him so much.
I can only imagine. I know how much you loved him.
If you want to talk about him, I'm here for you.
Thanks. I might take you up on that.
